name: Fast Game
description:
Play 4 different challenges at random increasing in difficulty as you win.

Try to unlock all achievements if you can.

This game is perfect for someone who is looking for a challenge.

Side effect of playing this game: Your aim might increase in fps games. (and rage inducing moments that come with it).

Unlock the last achievement and you are officially better than me at my own game.

Controls

To kill use LMB(left mouse button).
